title: Scattered Petals
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Sigh, we’re already halfway through summer break~ Is there anything we should do that we haven’t done yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>We’ve already gone to the beach and the summer festival...... We already had a lot of fun together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mhmm, but that’s not enough! Ayumu, is there somewhere else that you’d like to go?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>There isn’t anywhere I wanna go to specifically, but I think it would be fun if we all played with fireworks and sparklers together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! That sounds terrific~! Hey, don’t we hold a fireworks display?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huhhh!? I-Isn’t that dangerous for us to do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s an event we hold at my family’s hotel. The fireworks are huge, and we can watch them from the helicopter. It’s super pretty~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s my first time hearing about something like that...! B-But, we should also play with sparklers together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then let’s do both! Quick, let’s go and tell everyone about it! Let’s gooo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Wait, right now!? Mari-san!? Mari-saaaan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
